thread.title: Lady Gaga began halftime show with a tribute
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga began halftime show with a tribute

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Lady Gaga began halftime show with a tribute
text:
Lady Gaga began halftime show with a tribute Lady Gaga began halftime show with a tribute to America Post to Facebook Lady Gaga began halftime show with a tribute Lady Gaga began halftime show with a tribute to America  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/lady-gaga-super-bowl-halftime-show-2017-video-america/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Lady Gaga began halftime show with a tribute Luke Kerr-Dineen , USA TODAY Sports 8:41   
There was a lot of speculation heading into the Super Bowl 51 halftime show about whether Lady Gaga would make some kind of political statement. The star has been vocal on a number of issues in the past, and with the Super Bowl halftime show the biggest stage of her career, many thought she's seize the opportunity. 
And she did. Well, kind of. 
There was no overt political expression, but rather a message of unity. With lights illuminating red, white and blue behind her, she recited the Pledge of Allegiance and followed with renditions of "This Land is Your Land" and "God Bless America." 
Then, naturally, she jumped off the roof. Me, when someone asks me what it's like covering politics these days pic.twitter.com/BPBzcer0yu Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/lady-gaga-super-bowl-halftime-show-2017-video-america/ Most Popular
